stepFields.course_name_helper: The public name of your course. It can't be changed but you can give a new name in advanced settings later.
stepFields.org_helper: The name of the organization sponsoring the course. Note : the organization name is part of the course URL. This cannot be changed, but you can set a different display name in Advanced Settings later.
stepFields.course_number_helper: The unique number that identifies your course within your organization. Note : this is part of yout cours URL, no spaces or special characters are allowed and it cannot be changed.
stepFields.course_session_helper: The term in which yout course will run. Note : This is part of your course URL, so no spaces or special characters are allowed and it cannot be changed.
stepFields.rerunWarning: (Re-run mode this field cannot be changed)
stepFields.course_pacing_helper: The pace of the course can't be changed once the course has started
stepFields.instructor_paced_helper: Instructor-paced courses progress at the pace that the course autour sets. You can configure release dates for course content and due dates for assignments.
stepFields.self_paced_helper: Self-paced courses don’t have release dates for course content or due dates for assignments. Learners can complete course material at any time before the course end date
stepFields.course_type_helper: Choose a type of course from these followings
stepFields.is_invitation_only_helper: Instructor-paced courses progress at the pace that the course autour sets. You can configure release dates for course content and due dates for assignments
stepFields.is_manager_only_helper: Instructor-paced courses progress at the pace that the course autour sets. You can configure release dates for course content and due dates for assignments.
stepFields.is_mandatory_helper: Instructor-paced courses progress at the pace that the course autour sets. You can configure release dates for course content and due dates for assignments
stepFields.course_about_helper: A short text to present your course
stepFields.is_course_graded_helper: If this course must be graded
stepFields.has_menu_helper: If this course must have a menu
stepFields.course_grade_helper: Your overall rating scale for student final grades.
stepFields.effort_helper: Time spent on all course work
stepFields.language_helper: Identify the course language here. This is used to assist users find courses that are taught in a specific language. It is also used to localize the 'From:' field in bulk emails.

fr.cancelCreationContent: If you cancel your course creation all course details provided will be lost.
fr.verifyCourseInfo: Please verify course information before launching creation :
fr.waitCourseCreation: Your course is being created please wait
